1.content:
One trying evening after the most recent monster had bee defeated by the power rangers Rita came storming through the golden doors of the Moon place.
“Oh Zed I have a head ache it seems that no monsters of our will ever match the skill and cunning of those awful rangers.”
Zed raised his head up from the pillow “We have this same conversation every night. Tomorrow we will just make a stronger monster.”
“But zed I want to be able to settle down rule earth and have a family.” Rita voice getting steadily higher in pitch.
“ Ok tomorrow I will make sure I create a monster to destroy the rangers”. Zed huffed.
“But that won’t work we tried it a billon time already. What if we just capture the rangers and turn the in to our daughters that way we can get rid of the rangers and have our own loyal little monsters helping to rule earth.” Rita gushed
“Ok Whatever just let me get some sleep.” Zed remarked as he pouched his pillow

112.content:
Kim struggled against the sticky liquid as it solidified on her body and glued her feet to the ground, creating stiff stretchy patches that kept her stuck in place.

"It's just you and me pink ranger...why don't you give up and accept your cocooned fate!" The butterfly monster laughed and flapped its colorful wings as the air was filled with a shimmering dust that fell over Kim and caused sparks to fly up. The pink ranger cried out in pain as the dust burned her. The dust distracted Kim so Cocoonia was able to step towards her and open her mandibles again to shoot out the sticky webbing.

Kim was unable to move to avoid the blast as the webbing splattered all over her. Cocoonia laughed and fluttered her wings spraying more and more of the webbing.

"You're mine now pink ranger! Soon you will become trapped in a tight sticky cocoon and brought back to Lord Zedd's castle where you will be reborn as my loyal butterfly princess!"

"Never, bug-face!" Kim vowed she would resist at all costs, but was helpless to the monster's constant webbing barage. Soon her entire body was covered and the webbing solidified into a solid cocoon, leaving only her face sticking out.

"We'll leave the final cocooning for later...we don't want you to transform fully before Lord Zedd has had his fun with you!"

Kim could only squirm helplessly as her screams were muffled by her cocoon. Taken into the strong arms of Cocoonia, Kim was teleported away to meet her fate at Lord Zedd's castle.

*****************************************

"Well done Cocoonia...you will be rewarded for this present you have brought me," Lord Zedd growling in approval.

"All gift-wrapped for you my lord!" Cocoonia bowed and presented the tightly cocooned ranger, whose eyes were wide with fear being forced to watch.

"You belong to us now, pink ranger...soon you will serve Zedd and Rita's empire!

Kim listened to their laughter as she wondered what came next...

choices: Kim needs to be convinced that being a bug is MUCH better than being human...
Kim-Grub is hungry, and needs to find a ranger to feed upon!
11211.content:
The villains celebrated as the pink ranger was sealed in completely, enjoying watching the ranger struggle meekly inside the enclosure but the webbing was too thick for anything but ineffectual wobbles. Cocoonia flutters around her prize, stroking and squeezing her victim in preparation to be sucked back into her womb. The process was incredibly pleasurable for the monster, moaning and bucking as the puffed lips at the end of her thorax opened and began to take the cocoon inside.

Now the monster was laid out in Zedd and Rita's throneroom, rubbing her swollen belly and basking in the tremendous energy being sapped out of her soon-to-be bug princess. Cocoonia's antennae fluttered and chitinous hands with soft palms rubbed over the segments of her underside. "Soon, my pet. Your days as a power ranger and coming to an end..."

Cocoonia's belly continued to swell as the hours passed until she felt a stirring.

"Now...it is time..."

As easily as it had slid in, Cocoonia laid a smooth pink egg with purple specks and dots all over. As soon as it hit the ground, the egg began to wobble, then a crack formed, and the egg split apart. Emerging from the sac was a humanoid form, but far different than the human who had gone into the monster's womb. Instead, an anthropomorphic bug emerged - the ranger's pink helmet replaced by a smooth teardrop shaped head with two bulbous red eyes on the sides, long curled antennae on top, and a bug snout sided by a pair of mandibles. Her body was soft, segmented and pink all over, her former uniform turned into a pink and purple-spotted bug body, though distinctly feminine with a busty chest and thick furry stole encircling her neck like a collar. Her hands had been covered over in thick bug claws, her feet similarly turned bug-like with upturned toes on her purple boots. Though Kim had a thorax like Cocoonia this was much smaller - a plump little butt - she did not have wings like the monster.

"Ahhh...you are beautiful my child, but not yet complete. You are but a grub, and have work to do in order to rid yourself of the last of your humanity and complete your metamorphasis! Once you undergo your final change, you will never be able to be turned back!"

Kim-grub looked at herself in shock, the time spent inside the cocoon having corrupted her in mind and body, and she found herself filled with new strange instincts to capture, cocoon, and turn heroes into lowly bugs to grow their hive. But the knowledge she had been turned into a bug kept a part of her mind intact, and she tried desperately to remember that she was the pink power ranger, and that her friends were counting on her.

"Do not fight it my child...you will learn how wonderful it feels to subdue your prey and drain their energy. You will learn to love being a Cocoonia butterfly and serve as my loyal minion..."

Cocoonia sidled up against Kim, groping her breasts and tugging at her antennae lovingly.

"But where to begin...."

113.content:
Kim felt the liquid solidify over her feet, trapping her helplessly in place. She reached for her power bow but Cocoonia laughed and sent another stream of sticky liquid to splatter around Kim's chest and bind her arms to her side with a lasso of webbing.

"That's it putties - make the pink ranger pay for all the agony she has caused your kind..." the butterfly monster laughed and fluttered her wings as the putties warbled and held Kim tight while others punched kicked and knocked the ranger around.

"Soften her up nice and good...because the pink ranger is about to meet an old friend of hers who wants payback for what she did..."

Kim took the abuse for what seemed like hours, but her ranger training and powers kept her awake and upright through the endless beatings. Still, it was taking its toll, and after an hour Kim slumped over in the putties' arms. Suddenly, they stopped their onslaught as Kim heard a voice that filled her with fear.

"Nice to see you again pink ranger...this time, your power bow isn't going to save you from my belly!"

Kim looked up to see a giant round toad with a massive yellow belly and warty green skin. (http://www.rangercentral.com/images/mmpr...)

"T...Terror Toad!" Kim cried out in surprise, struggling hard against her bonds but unable to escape.

"You said it bub! *ribbit* Now it's time you pay for what you did to me last time! I'll make up for all the meals I lost by taking it out on you!!" The toad rubbed its flippers together evilly and waddled towards Kim.

"Unless....you give yourself to me and agree to become my Toad princess..."

"Never!" Kim cried out.

Terror Toad laughed and opened his mouth, his tongue shooting out and lashing Kim across the face, sending up a shower of sparks as the pink ranger screamed. Terror Toad stamped in close, slashing the prone ranger with his sharp clawed flippers, then rushed forward and fell belly-first on top of Kim, knocking her down and crushing her under his masssive gut. She heard him laugh as he ground his stomach into her, then stood up and wrapped him tongue around her neck and pulled Kim to her feet. Kim wobbled and felt her powers start to wane. She knew she wouldn't be able to withstand another onslaught like that.

"Well, what will it be, my pink pet? Become a toad, or become a permanent tatoo on my belly...?"

1132.content:
Defiantly, Kim spat in the face of the Terror Toad. "The only tatoos you are going to have you're going to have are scars and bruises all over that fat belly once I'm through with you!" Kim said with every ounce of her strength.

"Oh, so unwise!" said the Toad with a sadistic smile. With that, he used his tongue to toss Kim around like a rag doll smashing her against all the walls in the area. During the beating while the Terror Toad wasn't looking, Kim managed to grab her power bow and when he brung her around for another toss, she struck his head with the end of her bow causing him to cry out in pain and release his hold on Kim's neck. Kim used every ounce of her strength to get back to her feet and mount a defense. With all the beating she endured however, she could barely stand on both feet.

"Is it courage or stupidity that causes you to have this drive pink girl?" asked the Terror Toad "Alas, your efforts will have been in vain." "I don't think so wart head!" Kim shouted as she managed to aim her bow and shoot three arrows at her foe. However, Toad just effortlessly backed up and allowed the arrows to hit his stomach causing his reflecter shield to activate and fire the arrows back at the source. Kim jumped to get out of the way, but while she jumped away from the last arrow, she once again felt the Toad's sticky tongue around her body. He jerked her towards him with such great force that this caused her to lose her grip on her power bow. "This is what happens when you choose to fight against me girl" said the Toad as he tugged Kim closer to his body. Kim tried to resist and fought to get loose to get her bow back, but Toad sent a blast of energy from his horn causing the bow to explode. "Now there is nothing you can to destroy me now" said the evil Toad. "History will not repeat itself. I gave you the chance to be my bride and rule the world. But now you've made your choice, and there's not turning back. I've always wondered what you would taste like, and I have the perfect spot for you on my belly" he said as he pointed to the very bottom of his stomach.

Before Kim could protest, she found her head inside the Terror Toad's mouth facing upwards. She struggled as she felt his hands rub all over her body and could feel his tongue licking her. She squirmed when the tip of the tongue reached her legs and sneeked up to right in between them and started lucking that area. She screamed and begged for him to stop. "Please!" she shouted "I changed my mind, let me be your princess!" "Too late pink ranger" said the hungry Toad "Your fate has been decided." With that, he jerked his head upward and started to swallow Kim whole. Kim's screams were muffled as she slowly decended into the vast open area of his stomach and could only lash out her legs in protest. Terror Toad only continued to rub ther legs as she slowly decended into his belly and with a few more gulps, she was gone. Toad watched in admiration as Kim's face appeared at the bottom of his stomach, and with great joy, rubbed the image of the beaten pink ranger. "That was the most amazing meal I ever had!" said Terror Toad with a great big smile. "But the fun has only just begun."

122.content:
"Look deep into my eyes yellow ranger...listen to every word I say..." the watch-face of the creature slowly swayed as its stick arms held Trini's face in its grasp, the putties holding onto her arms so she couldn't get away.

"Look deeply ranger...down...down...down....hear and obey, relax and breathe...deeper and deeper..."

Trini tried to look away, but constant swaying and the monster's relaxing tone lulled her into a sleepy stupor.

"Look up and gaze into my eyes...feel my power touch your skin...taking you deeper and deeper, deeper and deeper..."

Trini had forgotten what she was fighting against as she began to look up, her mouth falling open as she felt herself sink into the monster's watch face as it swayed and pulsated, a swirling pattern drawing her deep into its center.

"You will listen and obey...falling deeper and deeper...obeying every word, like a good obedient ranger...listening to your master..."

"L...listening to my master..." Trini began to repeat slowly, forgetting she was naked and letting the relaxed state fall over her. It felt like she had tunnel vision, and the only thing that mattered were her master's words.

"Now say it my slave...obey your master...deeper and deeper..."

"deeper and deeper..." Trini replied.

"Who is your master, slave?"

"Sticktoria is my master..."

As Trini spoke those words the monster's branch-hands begin to grow up over her cheeks like roots. Feeling an incredble draining Trini felt her will sucked from her, feeling that she belonged to Sticktoria now. On her right buttcheek, a tattoo appeared of a tree with a watch growing from its roots, signifying that she belonged to him.

"Very good my slave, now we shall...."
